Fault.name: BPEL/CrearComision_BPEL.bpel
Fault.fix: Add function definition for this function "oraext:setFlowInstanceTitle" to the validator

Fault.name: BPEL/CrearComision_BPEL.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::ns2:Comision" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.
